articles.description: Nvidia’s revenue has exceeded the midpoint of the company’s own forecast by an average of 13%, more than twice the average over the past decade.
articles.content: Nvidia Corp. is the most expensive stock in the S&P 500 Index, with its shares trading for roughly 23 times the companys projected sales over the next 12 months. But theres a problem with that va… [+4275 chars]
